jsx.motion
Class Regular

java.lang.Object
  js.Disposable
      jsx.motion.Motion
          jsx.motion.Regular
Direct Known Subclasses:
Composite, Constant, Cubic, Quad, Quart, Quint, Uniform
public abstract class Regular
extends Motion

Defines motions with various regular mathematical functions.

A regular function is a unitary mathematical function whose domain is between 0 and 1 inclusive, and value range is from -1 to 1. A regular function can be a combination of other regular functions.

Author:
J.J.Liu (Jianjun Liu) at http://www.jscripter.org

call

protected static final double call(Regular r,
                                   double x)

Computes and returns the value, depending on a specified variable, of a specified regular function.

This method simply calls function(double) on the specified regular function and returns the result. This static method exists only for the function(double) body of a defined regular function to be callable in any subclasses of this one regardless of its visibility.

Parameters:
r - The regular function.
x - The independent variable.
Returns:
The value, depending on the variable x, of the regular function r.
Since:
1.0

function

protected abstract double function(double x)

Computes and returns the value, depending on a specified variable, of the regular function defined by this class.

Parameters:
x - The independent variable.
Returns:
The value, depending on x, of the defined regular function.
Since:
1.0
